title: Alister: The Archives of Edgar Brave, Book 1
description: As Edgar stared through the closing wormhole, he realized the only way to save his brother was to leap through it to the uncharted world on the other side.It was the booming of war drums that disrupted the longstanding peace in Cassini. They enjoyed free trade and full bellies until the raids began.But it was the arrival of the boy Edgar Brave that puzzled Stellamaris the most.He was new to this world, frantic to find his brother while evading the man who kidnapped him.But that was not what was puzzling.What was puzzling was that Edgar had some role to play in this looming war. And an ancient lore, older than Cassini itself, somehow involved Edgar.
author: Adam W. Schmitz
